_json.gridTitle: Page not found - The Red Headed Hostess
_json.description: Sentence game write a statement about self or someone else in the room. don't share statement fold paper back on line  pass paper to person on left They will read statement and draw it. fold it over again â€“ burrito style.  They need to cover the previous sentence.  And then pass it to the next person.  Trust me, this can be the most complicated part of this game.  keep going sentence, picture etc  Everyone should finish at the same time.  Then unravel the papers and have a good laugh.
